actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the amount of refund payable with respect to fuels used by local transit systems for commuter service.

summary.text: Changes the formula to increase the amount of refund payable under the Internal Revenue Code with respect to fuels used by local transit systems (who are non-highway users) for commuter service.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the amount of refund payable with respect to fuels used by local transit systems for commuter service.
